Key Match Events: Wanindu Hasaranga took 3 wickets for 21 runs.
Pathum Nissanka scored an unbeaten 55 off 48 balls.
Mohammad Hasnain and Haris Rauf picked up three early wickets.
Sri Lanka chased down the target with 18 balls and five wickets to spare.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's bowlers put in significant effort in the first innings.
Pakistan's innings struggled to gain momentum.
Sri Lanka's bowlers kept a tight lid on the scoring during the powerplay.
Pakistan did not hit a boundary off the bat from balls 5.5 to 14.3.
Sri Lanka's bowlers conceded only a single boundary off the bat in the first five overs.
